dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage prompts, users, and exhibits for the Create Spot community.
dashboard.managePromptsDescription: Create and manage weekly creative prompts. Set three-word prompts with date ranges and track submissions.
dashboard.manageUsersDescription: View and manage user accounts. Monitor user activity and handle account administration tasks.
dashboard.manageExhibitsDescription: Create and curate exhibits. Organize submissions into themed collections and manage exhibit content.

prompts.title: Manage Prompts
prompts.onlyEditableNote: Only prompts without submissions can be edited
prompts.allHaveSubmissions: All existing prompts have submissions and cannot be edited.
prompts.hasSubmissionsWarning: This prompt has submissions and cannot be modified.
prompts.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the prompt "{word1} / {word2} / {word3}"? This action cannot be undone.
prompts.daysRemaining: {count, plural, =1 {# day remaining} other {# days remaining}}
prompts.daysUntil: {count, plural, =1 {# day until next} other {# days until next}}
prompts.wordUsedRecently: "{word}" was used less than a month ago
prompts.wordUsedMonthsAgo: "{word}" was used {months, plural, =1 {# month} other {# months}} ago
prompts.wordInvalid: "{word}" may not be a valid dictionary word

exhibits.noExhibits: No exhibits found. Create your first exhibit to get started.

exhibits.manageContentDescription: Add, remove, and reorder submissions in this exhibit
exhibits.title: Title
exhibits.active: Active (exhibit will be visible if within time range)
exhibits.curatorDescription: Select the curator for this exhibit
exhibits.featuredArtistDescription: Optionally select a featured artist for this exhibit
exhibits.allowedViewTypesDescription: Select which view types users can use to view this exhibit
exhibits.featuredSubmissionDescription: Select a submission to feature for this exhibit
exhibits.timeRequired: Start time and end time are required
exhibits.endTimeAfterStart: End time must be after start time
exhibits.viewTypeRequired: At least one view type must be selected
